sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function Commentbox(props) { return ( <>
Name : {props.data.comment.name} email : {props.data.comment.email} Comment : {props.data.comment.commentContent} Date : {props.data.comment.date} Igone : {props.data.comment.ignore} ParentNode : {props.data.comment.parentNodeId}
) } export default Commentbox;
